query.pigql: q = load "PACK_COMPLIANCE"; q = filter q by {{row(Date_Year_Date_Month_14.selection, [0], ["min","max"]).asDateRange("date('Date_of_audit_Year','Date_of_audit_Month','Date_of_audit_Day')") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Country_18.selection, ["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}}; q = filter q by {{ column(City_21.selection,["City"]).asEquality("City") }};  q = filter q by {{ column(Commune_62.selection, ["Commune"]).asEquality("Commune") }}; q = filter q by {{column(Customer_type_27.selection, ["Customer_type"]).asEquality("Customer_type") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Trade_Format_24.selection, ["Trade_Format"]).asEquality("Trade_Format") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(X4P_5P_6P_47.selection, ["X4P_5P_6P"]).asEquality("X4P_5P_6P") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Top_Customer_70.selection, ["Top_Customer"]).asEquality("Top_Customer") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Customer_29.selection, ["Customer"]).asEquality("Customer") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Local_Outlet_Name_67.selection, ["Local_Outlet_Name"]).asEquality("Local_Outlet_Name") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Channel_25.selection, ["Channel"]).asEquality("Channel") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Subchannel_26.selection, ["Subchannel"]).asEquality("Subchannel") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Store_type_65.selection, ["Store_type"]).asEquality("Store_type") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Sales_region_63.selection, ["Sales_region"]).asEquality("Sales_region") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Sales_area_23.selection, ["Sales_area"]).asEquality("Sales_area") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Sales_territory_22.selection, ["Sales_territory"]).asEquality("Sales_territory") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Field_Execution_Manager_71.selection, ["Field_Execution_Manager"]).asEquality("Field_Execution_Manager") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Store_Operations_Manager_72.selection, ["Store_Operations_Manager"]).asEquality("Store_Operations_Manager") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Field_Sales_Manager_73.selection, ["Field_Sales_Manager"]).asEquality("Field_Sales_Manager") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Product_division_30.selection, ["Product_division"]).asEquality("Product_division") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Product_category_9.selection, ["Product_category"]).asEquality("Product_category") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Customer_13.selection, ["Customer"]).asEquality("Customer") }}; q = filter q by {{column(Product_category_31.selection, ["Product_category"]).asEquality("Product_category") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Country_39.selection, ["Country"]).asEquality("Country") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(X4P_5P_6P_48.selection, ["X4P_5P_6P"]).asEquality("X4P_5P_6P") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Region_51.selection, ["Region"]).asEquality("Region") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Channel_12.selection, ["Channel"]).asEquality("Channel") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Product_category_9.selection, ["Product_category"]).asEquality("Product_category") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Customer_13.selection, ["Customer"]).asEquality("Customer")}}; q = filter q by {{ column(Country_3.selection, ["Country"]).asEquality("Country") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(X4P_5P_6P_46.selection, ["X4P_5P_6P"]).asEquality("X4P_5P_6P")}}; q = filter q by {{ column(Region_50.selection, ["Region"]).asEquality("Region") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Channel_11.selection, ["Channel"]).asEquality("Channel") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Product_category_10.selection, ["Product_category"]).asEquality("Product_category")}}; q = filter q by {{ column(Customer_14.selection, ["Customer"]).asEquality("Customer")}}; diff = group q by all; diff = foreach diff generate avg('NPD_Compliance') as 'Percent_Diff', (case when avg('NPD_Compliance')  < 0.5 then "#EE0A50" when avg('NPD_Compliance')  < 0.7 then "#F8CE00" else "#0FD178" end) as 'color';

q = load "PACK_SCORE"; q = filter q by 'Product_market' in {{selection(Product_market_52)}} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_18) }} && 'City' in {{ selection(City_21) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_62) }} && 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_27) }} && 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_24) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_47) }} && 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_70) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_29) }} && 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_67) }} &&  'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_25) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_26) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_63) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_23) }} && 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_22) }} &&  'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_71) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_72) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_73) }} &&  'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_30) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_31) }} &&  'SKU' in {{ selection(SKU_68) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_3) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_46) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_50) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_11) }} &&  'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_10) }} &&  'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_14) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_39) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_48) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_51) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_12) }} &&  'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_9) }} &&  'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_13) }} && 'Product_Brand' in {{selection(Product_brand_54)}} && 'Product_Sector' in {{selection(Product_sector_53)}}; cur = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["current month".."current month"];last = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["1 month ago".."1 month ago"]; diff = cogroup cur by ('Product_category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU') full, last by ('Product_category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU'); diff = foreach diff generate coalesce(cur::'Product_category',last::'Product_category') as 'Product_category', coalesce(cur::'SKU', last::'SKU') as 'SKU', coalesce(cur::'SKU_ID', last::'SKU_ID') as 'SKU_ID', coalesce(avg(cur.NPD)-avg(last.NPD),999) as 'ndpAverage', avg(cur.NPD) as currentNPD, avg(last.NPD) as lastNPD; diff = foreach diff generate (case when ndpAverage != 999 then ndpAverage when currentNPD is null then (-lastNPD) else (currentNPD) end) as Percent_Diff, Product_category as 'Product_category', SKU_ID as 'SKU_ID', SKU as 'SKU', 'currentNPD' as 'currentNPD', 'lastNPD' as 'lastNPD';

q = load "PS_OVERALL_COMPLIANCE_LV"; q = filter q by 'Product_Market' in {{selection(Product_market_52)}} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_18) }} && 'City' in {{ selection(City_21) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_62) }} && 'Key_Customer_Type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_27) }} && 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_24) }} && 'PS_Standard' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_47) }} && 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_70) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_29) }} && 'Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_67) }} &&  'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_25) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_26) }} && 'Sales_Region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_63) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_23) }} && 'Sales_Territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_22) }} &&  'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_71) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_72) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_73) }} &&  'Product_Division' in {{ selection(Product_division_30) }} && 'Product_Category' in {{ selection(Product_category_31) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_3) }} && 'PS_Standard' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_46) }} && 'Sales_Region' in {{ selection(Region_50) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_11) }} &&  'Product_Category' in {{ selection(Product_category_10) }} &&  'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_14) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_39) }} && 'PS_Standard' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_48) }} && 'Sales_Region' in {{ selection(Region_51) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_12) }} &&  'Product_Category' in {{ selection(Product_category_9) }} &&  'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_13) }}; diff = group q by all; diff = foreach diff generate (avg('Pack_Compliance_LV'))-(avg('Pack_Compliance')) as 'Percent_Diff', (case when (avg('Pack_Compliance_LV'))-(avg('Pack_Compliance')) < 0.5 then "#EE0A50" when (avg('Pack_Compliance_LV'))-(avg('Pack_Compliance')) < 0.7 then "#F8CE00" else "#0FD178" end) as 'color';

q = load "PACK_COMPLIANCE"; q = filter q by 'Top_Customer' == "Yes"; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in {{selection(Date_Year_Date_Month_14)}}; q = group q by ('Customer'); q = foreach q generate 'Customer' as 'Customer', avg('NPD_Compliance') as 'avg_NPD'; q = order q by 'avg_NPD' desc;

q = load "PACK_SCORE"; q = filter q by 'Top_Customer' == "Yes"; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in {{selection(Date_Year_Date_Month_14)}}; q = group q by ('Customer'); q = foreach q generate 'Customer' as 'Customer', avg('NPD') as 'avg_NPD'; q = order q by 'avg_NPD' desc;

parameters.text: This chart displays the % of NPD SKUs that were available in the enrolled stores for the country over a period of last 13 months.
This chart displays the % of NPD SKUs that were available in the enrolled stores for the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Pack compliant for the country over a period of last 13 months.
This chart displays the % of NPD SKUs that were available in the enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country in the latest month.
This chart lists all the audited NPD SKUs in the country, the % of enrolled stores that they were available in the latest month, and the variance in availability from the previous month
This chart displays the % of NPD SKUs that were available in the enrolled stores across all the Channels in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of 4P, 5P and 6P stores that were Pack compliant for the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Pack compliant across all the Channels in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Pack compliant for the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MT enrolled stores that were Pack compliant across all the Product categories in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Pack compliant in different sales regions of the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of NPD SKUs that were available in 4P, 5P and 6P stores in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of NPD SKUs that were available in enrolled stores in different sales regions of the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of NPD SKUs that were available in MT enrolled stores across all the Product categories in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country which were Pack Compliant in the latest month.
